name: iteration
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
formal the process of doing something again and again, usually to improve it, or one of the times you do it: the repetition and iteration that goes on in designing something The software is on its fifth iteration.
mathematics, computing
  specialized an amount that you get when you use a mathematical rule several times
